titles: A letter from a gentleman in the city to a gentleman in the country, about the odiousness of persecution wherein the rise and end of the penal laws for religion in this kingdom, are consider'd : occasioned by the late rigorous proceedings against sober dissenters, by certain angry justices in the country.
author: A. N.
Penn, William, 1644-1718.
notes: Attributed to William Penn. Cf. Smith, J. Friends' books.
This item is identified as Wing L1388A (entry cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.) at reel 744:27 and as Wing N3 at reel 796:18.
